title: 81/279/EEC: Commission Decision of 1 April 1981 approving a programme for the fruit and vegetable processing sector in the Land Baden-Württemberg, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 1 April 1981 approving a programme for the fruit and vegetable processing sector in the Land Baden-Württemberg, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the German text is authentic) (81/279/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme for the fruit and vegetable processing sector in the Land Baden-Württemberg submitted by the Government of the Federal Republic of Germany pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 on 17 October 1980 and supplemented on 3 December 1980 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 April 1981.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 51, 23.2.1977, p. 1.
